properties.SITE_FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: The one-acre Site is located at 2127 and 2129 Lejeune Boulevard in the city of Jacksonville in Onslow County, North Carolina, and is part of a larger commercial retail district (Figure 1 5th FYR). The Site is located approximately two miles northeast of the Marine Corps Base Camp Lejeune.
